info.title: Account Manager APIs
info.description: Technical specification of Account Manager APIs. This APis provide functionalities for managing the Account Owner's account. In addition, they provide functionalities for performing the linking process between a Service and the Account Owner's account.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Object representing the Account to be created

201.description: Successful Response; the Account was created successfully

409.description: Conflict - Account already present with the same username

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account to be retrieved

200.description: Successful Response. Required Account

404.description: Not Found - Account with provided username was not found

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account to be updated

200.description: Successful Response; the Account was updated successfully

404.description: Not Found - Account with provided username was not found

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account to be deleted

200.description: Successful Response; the Account was deleted successfully

404.description: Not Found - Account with provided username was not found

post.description: Creates a new Telephone for an existing Account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Object representing the Telephone to be created

201.description: Successful Response; the Telephone was created successfully

404.description: Not Found - Account with provided username was not found

get.description: Gets all the Telephones of an existing Account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

200.description: Successful Response; Required Telephones

404.description: Not Found - Telephones for the provided Account were not found

get.description: Gets a specific Telephone of an existing Account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

parameters.name: telephoneId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Telephone to be retrieved

200.description: Successful Response; the required Telephone

404.description: Not Found - Telephone for the provided Account was not found

put.description: Updates an existing Telephone of an existing Account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

parameters.name: telephoneId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Telephone to be updated

200.description: Successful Response; the Telephone was updated successfully

404.description: Not Found - Telephone for the provided Account was not found

delete.description: Deletes an existing Telephone of an existing Account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

parameters.name: telephoneId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Telephone to be deleted

200.description: Successful Response; the Telephone was deleted successfully

404.description: Not Found - Telephone for the provided Account was not found

post.description: Creates a new Service Link Record for an existing Account. It represents the link between a Service and the Account Owner's account. It is the result of the linkage process provided by CDV (Account Manager itself). The goal is to store and retrieve Account Owner's personal data through the properties names required by the service.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Object representing the Service Link Record to be created

201.description: Successful Response; the Service Link Record was created successfully

404.description: Not Found - Account with provided username was not found

get.description: Gets all the Service Link Records of an existing Account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

200.description: Successful Response; Required Service Link Record

404.description: Not Found - Service Link Records for the provided Account were not found

get.description: Gets a specific Service Link Record of an existing Account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Account

parameters.name: slrId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Service Link Record to be retrieved

200.description: Successful Response; the required Service Link Record

404.description: Not Found - Service Link Record for the provided Account was not found

Account.description: It contains all the information related to the Account Owner. It also contains all the Service Link Records related to the Account.

_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by Account Manager

username.description: Username used as access credential for the Account Owner

password.description: Password used as access credential for the Account Owner

created.description: Creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format. E.g. 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ'

telephones.description: The list of Account Owner's telephones

emails.description: The list of Account Owner's email addresses

contacts.description: The list of Account Owner's contacts

particulars.description: The list of Account Owner's particular information

serviceLinkRecords.description: The list of Account Owner's Service Link Records

Email.description: This entity represents the email address of the entity which belongs to.

_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by Account Manager

Type.description: Specific email type ( PERSONAL, WORK, SCHOOL,OTHER)

primary.description: Indicates if the Email object is considered the primary one.

Contact.description: This entity represents the detailed Contact information of the entity which belongs to.

_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by Account Manager

country.description: Country (same of State, if not in US)

type.description: Specific contact type ( PERSONAL, WORK, SCHOOL,OTHER)

Particular.description: This entity represents the additional information of the entity which belongs to.

_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by Account Manager

dateOfBirth.description: Creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format. E.g. 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ'

Telephone.description: This entity represents the telephone of the entity which belongs to.

_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by Account Manager

type.description: Specific telephone type ( PERSONAL, WORK, SCHOOL,OTHER)

ServiceLinkRecord.description: This entity represents the link between a Service and the Account Owner's account. It is the result of the linkage process provided by CDV (Account Manager). The goal is to store and retrieve Account Owner's personal data through the properties names required by the service.

_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by Account Manager

serviceId.description: Unique identifier of the linked service relative to this Service Link Record

surrogateId.description: The surrogate identifier of the Account Owner. It is a pseudonym that associates Account Owner to his/her account at the service.

accountId.description: The unique identifier of the Account, assigned by the Account Manager, related to the surrogateId

created.description: The creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format. E.g. 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ'

serviceLinkStatusRecords.description: The list of the statuses of this Service Link Record. It can have more than one status, in order to track its life cycle.

ServiceLinkStatusRecord.description: This entity represents the detailed status of a Service Link Record.

_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by Account Manager

issuedAt.description: The creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format. E.g. 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ'

ErrorResponse.description: The Object representing the Error information

message.description: The message related to runtime error
